name: hugo-butterfly
description: A Hugo theme inspired by hexo-theme-butterfly

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "TS,CSS,Hugo" -c "blue,green,yellow" "pnpm run ts:watch" "pnpm run css:watch" "hugo server --environment development --buildDrafts --buildFuture --disableFastRender"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run ts:build && pnpm run css:build && hugo --environment production --minify && pnpm exec pagefind --site public --output-subdir _pagefind --force-language zh --root-selector main
scripts.build:dev: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run ts:dev && pnpm run css:dev && hugo --environment development && pnpm exec pagefind --site public --output-subdir _pagefind --force-language zh --root-selector main
scripts.build:staging: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run ts:build && pnpm run css:build && hugo --environment staging --minify && pnpm exec pagefind --site public --output-subdir _pagefind --force-language zh --root-selector main
scripts.preview: pnpm run build && hugo server --environment production --disableLiveReload
scripts.preview:staging: pnpm run build:staging && hugo server --environment staging --disableLiveReload
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:cache
scripts.validate:full: pnpm run validate && pnpm run build:dev
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin main
